revision.text: Possibly: Report on the events and circumstances, which produced the union of the kingdoms of England and Scotland; on the effects of this great national event, on the reciprocal interests of both kingdoms; and on the political and commercial influence of Great-Britain, in the balance of power in Europe. By John Bruce. 2v. ([London : s.n., 1799.]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2434132~S1
